name: Fears of Glasses o-o
description:
In this game you have to overcome your fears.
Monsters from under the bed, monsters who knock on doors, knock out windows, cemetery, bugs, spiders, aliens and much more.
All that you are afraid of, you will find in this game.

Using the keyboard and mouse, you have to control a character who wears glasses and find out his story by going to the end
Why does he wake up in a house full of horrors, why does he sleep with glasses, you will learn all this when you reach the end of the game.

You can open doors with the Q key.
Open, close your eyes to the E key.
Drag or destroy items by pressing the left mouse button.

In the left glass of the glasses, hints will appear at what moment which key will need to be used.

The longer your eyes are open, the longer they will be closed.
If your eyes are closed for a long time, you will die of fear.
If your eyes are open at the wrong moment, you will be killed by a monster.

You will have to carefully consider each step, when to open your eyes, when to close, in order to survive.
